title: Mecha Aatrox Skin Color
body:
Is it me or is the Mecha Aatrox skin a turquoise kind of color now? It might be a skin rework, but if it's not do I need to fix something? Haven't seen any threads about the skin being a different color than what it normally was.

What I thought it was before: http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Q0emp_pLSC0/U7NUr1F-i1I/AAAAAAAAS4A/oU7nlYtRTJM/s1600/aatroxx.jpg

What it is right now (I think?): https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kDajwXXmhA0/WManto_WZJI/AAAAAAAAf3o/yzH1JKMgCOsDYAkomoVUZCDUIKvaiEXigCEw/s1600/aatrox.jpg

replies.body:
Hey mtan1229! 

Looking through the files, nothing changed post release from what I can tell. I think what you're looking at is a capture from a Skins Spotlight video/screen caps, which is likely PBE coverage. The textures that originally went on PBE weren't what shipped to live. So, the textures were changed, but it was during the development of the skin itself, but not post release. 

*Left is original, right is what shipped.* These are just the flat textures, so the normal map lighting isn't applied. ^^  The left texture was submitted in late June of 2014, and the right was submitted in early July of 2014, which is around when this guy was shipping. 

https://imgur.com/FZqziP2

I didn't see anything post release - I checked for things like texture rebalances/any changes when the chromas for this guy came out, and nothing appears to be changed.

Please feel free to call me out on anything if you think it's incorrect, this is just what I've found from checking out the file history for this skin. :)
Thanks for the correction. Although it's not exactly identical, I'm still pleased with the way it turned out in the end.

> [{quoted}](name=mtan1229,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8dyqwnfX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-17T01:12:20.586+0000)
>
> Thanks for the correction. Although it's not exactly identical, I'm still pleased with the way it turned out in the end.

Np!

{{sticker:katarina-love}}
